name: StationAR
description:
This is a tiny game about making money on a new planet witch is the place where you are and you have to use your camera to see it.

You have to place a HeadQuarter, he will make money but slowly. You have to place Mines to collect ressources. Turrets are just cosmetic.

Instructions :

  • Look at the ground and wait untill a place indicator appear.
  • The button Collect Mines will go to mines to get the ressources and go back to the HQ to convert ressources to money.

It's a little game when you have 10 minutes.

Assets made by Kenney : https://www.kenney.nl/
